definition: one of a pair of long straps (usually connected to the bit or the headpiece) used to control a horse, keep in check
details:
noun
- one of a pair of long straps (usually connected to the bit or the headpiece) used to control a horse
- any means of control
= example: any means of control
verb
- keep in check
= synonyms: harness
- stop or check by or as if by a pull at the reins
= example: stop or check by or as if by a pull at the reins
= synonyms: rein in
- stop or slow up one's horse or oneself by or as if by pulling the reins
= example: stop or slow up one's horse or oneself by or as if by pulling the reins
= synonyms: rein in
- control and direct with or as if by reins
= example: control and direct with or as if by reins
= synonyms: harness
